name: DailyNewsinNiuean
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We have the news brought to you week days in the Niuean Language. Brought to you by PMN Niue. We also have news in other Pacific languages including Samoan, Tongan and Cook Islands.

To find out more about the services we provide in Pacific Media visit our website www.pmn.co.nz
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
